body.p: Which of the following concepts would be classified as vital functions of human life?

multiple_choice.choice: fluid transport within the body, and control and regulation.
the cell is the basic unit of life
the nervous system and the cardiovascular system

response.feedback: Correct. These are two of the body's vital functions. Exchange with the environment and structure, support, and movement are also vital functions.
Incorrect. Recognizing the cell is the basic unit of life is one of the big ideas in physiology, not a vital function.
Incorrect. Homeostasis and structure and function are important organizational themes, but they apply to all of the various vital functions in the human body.
Incorrect. These are organ systems that function to perform the vital functions, not independent vital functions.
